name: Memory World
description:
Memory World is an Action/Platformer Puzzle game made as our 3rd year open world project at Isart Digital.

Stuck in an abandoned and corrupted memory world, the digitized remains of an alien civilization, you must find a way to re-assemble the destroyed portal and find your way back home.
The game features around 1 hour of gameplay and multiple quests that will have you help other archeologist understand what happened to this city and the people that lived there.

This project was made using the Unreal Engine 4 in the span of a month and a half with a team of 8 Game Designers :
- Amandine Fradique
- Antoine Guérin
- Charlie Wagner
- Éloïse Vrel
- Julien Di Natale
- Ludovic Hourman
- Pierre-Oscar Chantebel
- Vincent Rigaud
